description: InferRxNorm detects medications as entities listed in a patient record and links to the normalized concept identifiers in the RxNorm database from the National Library of Medicine. Amazon Comprehend Medical only detects medical entities in English language texts.

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: The input text used for analysis.

nested_items.name: Entities
nested_items.description: The medication entities detected in the text linked to RxNorm concepts. If the action is successful, the service sends back an HTTP 200 response, as well as the entities detected.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The numeric identifier for the entity. This is a monotonically increasing id unique within this response rather than a global unique identifier.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The segment of input text extracted from which the entity was detected.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of the entity. The recognized categories are GENERIC or BRAND_NAME.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Describes the specific type of entity. For InferRxNorm, the recognized entity type is MEDICATION.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of the detected entity.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the entity ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: The extracted attributes that relate to the entity. The attributes recognized by InferRxNorm are DOSAGE, DURATION, FORM, FREQUENCY, RATE, ROUTE_OR_MODE, and STRENGTH.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of attribute. The types of attributes recognized by InferRxNorm are BRAND_NAME and GENERIC_NAME.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the segment of text is correctly recognized as an attribute.

nested_items.name: RelationshipScore
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the attribute is accurately linked to an entity.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The numeric identifier for this attribute. This is a monotonically increasing id unique within this response rather than a global unique identifier.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute begins. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The 0-based character offset in the input text that shows where the attribute ends. The offset returns the UTF-8 code point in the string.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The segment of input text which corresponds to the detected attribute.

nested_items.name: Traits
nested_items.description: Contextual information for the attribute. InferRxNorm recognizes the trait NEGATION for attributes, i.e. that the patient is not taking a specific dose or form of a medication.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Provides a name or contextual description about the trait.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of the detected trait.

nested_items.name: Traits
nested_items.description: Contextual information for the entity.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Provides a name or contextual description about the trait.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has in the accuracy of the detected trait.

nested_items.name: RxNormConcepts
nested_items.description: The RxNorm concepts that the entity could refer to, along with a score indicating the likelihood of the match.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the RxNorm concept.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: RxNorm concept ID, also known as the RxCUI.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend Medical has that the entity is accurately linked to the reported RxNorm concept.

nested_items.name: PaginationToken
nested_items.description: If the result of the previous request to InferRxNorm was truncated, include the PaginationToken to fetch the next page of medication entities.

nested_items.name: ModelVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the model used to analyze the documents, in the format n.*n*.*n* You can use this information to track the model used for a particular batch of documents.
